summary: This document is a quarterly roster and daily assignment log for a staff member named T. Noel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering the period from June to September 2019. It details shift assignments, leave types, and unit postings, providing a record of personnel activity at the facility during the time Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

persons.name: T. Noel
persons.context: Staff member at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York whose daily assignments, leave, and shift postings are detailed in this quarterly roster.

events.title: Epstein's Arrival at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested and subsequently incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. This roster covers staff assignments during his incarceration period.

events.title: Epstein Found Injured in Cell
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his cell at MCC New York, an incident that preceded his death. This roster shows staff assignments on that date.

events.title: Staff Assignment - SHU #1
events.description: Staff member T. Noel was assigned to 'SHU #1 OT NAM 2' on this date, indicating a posting in or related to the Special Housing Unit.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering Q2 and Q3 of 2019.
The roster details the shifts, leave (Admin, Sick, Annual, LWOP), and specific unit postings (e.g., SHU, 9 NORTH) for staff member T. Noel.
The timeframe of the document (June - September 2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at MCC New York, from his arrest in July 2019 to his death in August 2019.
Assignments to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) are recorded, which is relevant as Epstein was held in the SHU.
The document is a routine administrative record that provides context for staffing and operations at the facility during a critical period.
